name: White Iron Greatsword
title: Mourning Silver Snow: White Iron Greatsword
desc: A lightweight greatsword made of white iron with a silver sheen.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">The character deals +1 DMG.(<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
